location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Deposition of Ibrahim bowa ben Abdul Karim Dholkey, previously a lascar on the Deira Dowla, made before Henry Meriton, Superintendent at Bombay

mods.abstract: Deposition by Ibrahim bowa ben Abdul Karim Dholkey (may be: Ibrahim bawa bin Abdulkarim Dholki) describing his capture by Joasemee [QawƒÅsim] pirates and subsequent sale to a crew member. The deposition also lists the places they travelled to around the Persian Gulf, the skirmishes they engaged in and the strength and formation of the Joasemee fleets. The deposition concludes with his escape at Kishma [Qeshm] and eventual travel to Muscat.
